title: Billy Graham Sermons - Complete Collection (1957-1991)
description:
This is a complete collection (mp4 format) of Billy Graham "crusade" sermon TV recordings, as well as other rare recordings of Billy Graham preaching.

Billy Graham is an evangelical christian preacher, and one of the most influential people of the 20th century (in a good way). He shared the gospel of Jesus Christ to more than 200 million people. He was an influential factor in both the fall of racial segregation in America, the Berlin Wall, and apartheid.

For each show, the starting time of the actual preaching (Billy Graham sermon) is indicated. For instance, in the "1957 - How to Live the Christian Life" sermon, Billy Graham starts preaching 13 minutes 28 seconds into the recording. This will allow you to skip the music/singing if so desired. But there's a lot of famous artists in these crusades (for instance, Johnny Cash).

Hear the word of God and be blessed.
